_sText:
Welcome to "pyramid_texture_beta"

Map created By El_Mexicano

This is an "AIM" map , with 32 slots in each team, 32 slots for the terrorists & 32 
slots for the counter-terroristes for total of 64 slots!!!

There is no aim , the only aim is to kill all players of the other team!
It's a "FUN" map , that's why all the creation of this map was based on the FUN side 
of the map , and that's why i've used the grey & orange textures like the ones you 
can find in "fy_blazin" or " texture_city " map (for those who know them)

there is , as often with my maps a warpzone, hope you'll fide it one day

the .bsp file makes 7,1 MO , the .res file 1 ko ans the Skybox textures 4,00 MO

There is a lot of light effects  and sound effects like , storms and weird sounds which scares you ^^
And for those you knows it , the skybox texture is "Grimmnight" , which is like a storm in the night with the moon!!

Big thanks to the LoS*LaTiNoS production for their help & all the team for the help they gave me 

=> LoS*LaTiNoS internet pages : http://www.loslatinos.fr
=> LoS*LaTiNoS server :  91.121.169.49:27015  FUN,RUSH & NO CAMP

ALL my maps are on preview , test & disponibles on our server !!

El_mexicano
(ps: if you encounter any problems with the map , please contact us at 
www.loslatinos.fr , thank you ).
